message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product I believe will be highly valuable to you.  While I can't disclose specifics right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $12000 to me. I'm willing to let it go for $15000,  but I'm open to discussing a price that works for both of us. Let me know if you're interested, and we can arrange a time to chat more.
